Description:
Detects sign-in with properties that are unfamiliar to the user. The detection considers past sign-in history to look for anomalous sign-ins.

Author: Mark Morowczynski '@markmorow', Gloria Lee, '@gleeiamglo'
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Unfamiliar Sign-In Properties
Query: sourcetype='azure-riskdetection' eql select * from _source_ where riskeventtype = 'unfamiliarfeatures'
